name: World Soccer Champs
description:
Manage your team and try to lead them to sweet success on this fun and thrilling soccer game. Includes real football leagues from around the world, as well as loads of local clubs and national teams.

The sleek interface will completely immerse you in the electrifying drama of every match. Impress the fans and pass, dribble and shoot your way to victory using intuitive swipe-controls.
Manage your team, score goals, win trophies, change clubs and reach victory!

Download today and play for FREE!

KEY FEATURES

• Innovative gameplay and Intelligent opponents.
• 100+ leagues and cups from all around the world.
• Real player names with downloadable data pack.
• Achievements & leaderboards to see who ranks on top.
• Simple to play, challenging to dominate.

IMPORTANT
* This game is free to play.
* This app uses wifi or mobile data (if available) to download game content and advertising. You can disable mobile data usage on your device from within Settings/Mobile Data.
* This app contains third party advertising. Unrequested advertising can be disabled by purchase.

VISIT US: http://www.monkeyibrowstudios.com
LIKE US: facebook.com/worldsoccerchamps
